mapper.select:
select b1.no, b1.subject, b1.userid, b1.hit, b1.writedate, b2.reply_count from (select no, subject, userid, hit, date_format(writedate, '%m-%d %h:%i') writedate from board
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
order by no desc limit ${onePageRecord} offset ${offsetPoint}) b1 left outer join (select no, count(no) reply_count from reply_board group by no) b2 on b1.no=b2.no

select b1.no, b1.subject, b1.userid, b1.hit, b1.writedate, b2.reply_count from (select no, subject, userid, hit, date_format(writedate, '%m-%d %h:%i') writedate from board
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
order by no desc limit ${onePageRecord} offset ${offsetPoint}) b1 left outer join (select no, count(no) reply_count from reply_board group by no) b2 on b1.no=b2.no

select count(no) cnt from board
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
mapper.delete: delete from board where no =${param1} and userid=#{param2}
mapper.update: update board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where no =${no} and userid =#{userid}
